docs.title: Moving of Event Issuer documentation
docs.text:
The Event Issuer documentation has been moved

The Event Issuer documentation has been moved to a new page. This has been done so that we can gather all external platform components in one wiki. The same information that was found here is available on the new wiki.

Link: https://bane-nor.github.io/platform-docs/integration/Event-Issuer/
